headline: Comparing HTTP/3 vs. HTTP/2 Performance
keywords: HTTP2, HTTP3, Better Internet, QUIC, Performance
description: We announced support for HTTP/3, the successor to HTTP/2, during Cloudflareâ€™s birthday week last year. Our goal is and has always been to help build a better Internet. Even though HTTP/3 is still in draft status, we've seen a lot of interest from our users.
